name: helicone-router
description: A high-performance proxy router for LLM APIs built with Rust

scripts.build: cd .. && cargo build --release && cp target/release/llm-proxy npx/dist/helicone-router-macos && chmod +x npx/dist/helicone-router-macos
scripts.build:linux: cd .. && cargo build --release --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu && cp target/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/llm-proxy npx/dist/helicone-router-linux && chmod +x npx/dist/helicone-router-linux
scripts.build:linux-musl: cd .. && cargo build --release --target x86_64-unknown-linux-musl && cp target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/release/llm-proxy npx/dist/helicone-router-linux && chmod +x npx/dist/helicone-router-linux
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:linux
scripts.build:all-musl: npm run build && npm run build:linux-musl
scripts.setup-targets: rustup target add x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu && rustup target add x86_64-unknown-linux-musl
scripts.clean:docker: docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f

author: Helicone
